thread.title: Douglas Williams, CEO of Williams Data Management, Chosen as Chairman of the Board for the Vernon Chamber of Commerce

author: cnbc.com
title: Douglas Williams, CEO of Williams Data Management, Chosen as Chairman of the Board for the Vernon Chamber of Commerce

organizations.name: board for vernon's chamber of commerce
williams data management williams data management

text:
LOS ANGELES, Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Williams Data Management, Southern California's leader in Records Management, is pleased to announce that Douglas Williams CEO of Williams Data Management, has been appointed Chairman of the Board of the Vernon Chamber of Commerce.
The appointment took place on February 02, 2018 at Williams Data Management's corporate offices. The Vernon Chamber of Commerce has a long-standing history for the last 68 years of promoting and expanding business within Vernon, and Douglas Williams looks to continue the growth for the members of the chamber and businesses located within its city limits.
"I am honored to have been chosen as the new Chairman of the Board for Vernon's Chamber of Commerce," Douglas Williams stated. "I know the passion and vision that the Chamber and I share will continue to foster growth and uphold the Chamber's mission of enhancing economic prosperity for the businesses operating in Vernon."
About Williams Data Management
Williams Data Management specializes in Data Lifecycle Management. Operating in the Records and Information Management industry, it has been serving businesses throughout Southern California since 1922. The company is committed to records management and offers full-service solutions, including physical and digital records storage, document scanning and indexing, certified document and hard drive shredding, product destruction, business continuity planning, and Information Governance programs. Williams holds numerous certifications for data compliance and destruction including SSAE16, NAIAD "AAA" Certification, and is a member of PRISM. For more information, visit www.williamsdatamanagement.com or call 888-478-FILE.
About Vernon Chamber of Commerce
Since 1950, the Vernon Chamber of Commerce has been supporting industry in the City of Vernon by offering members customized, individually-tailored programs designed specifically to strengthen business. For more information, visit the Chamber's Web site at www.vernonchamber.org , or call (323) 583-3313.
